title: Famous Stars and Straps
content:
Help! Can anybody tell me what this western font is?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100108030405im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3XANY_6297.png)
author: typesetter1

comments.content:
Similar to [Opera House](http://web.archive.org/web/20100108030405/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/opera-house/) from Solotype. Just needs squooshing/stretching, to make narrower. Not many of these Tuscan styles have the squared S that I have seen so far. (It was not at Dafont either, by the way.)

- Mike Yanega
